basics.name: Alex Mathison
basics.label: Systems Administrator
basics.summary: My experience covers working with complex Payment Platform systems and troubleshooting Windows, MacOS and Linux operating systems. Additionally, in my previous positions, I gained extensive knowledge of Microsoft 365, including Active Directory and Intune. I also ascertained a wide set of skills in DevOps concepts such as containerization (Docker), automation platforms such as Ansible/Terraform and Kubernetes.

references.name: Mathew Claut, Head of Service Delivery at PPRO
Amit Dawar, Head of Service Delivery at Monash University
Harry Goodwin, Senior Systems Engineer at Sportsbet

work.name: PPRO
highlights: AzureAD and MS Endpoint Manager administration for an office size of approx. 150 people including management of suppliers and inventory tracking.
PowerShell scripting for application deployments to end users
Supported critical SFTP infrastructure for all clients via Azure
Managing multiple databases to assist in supporting providers (MongoDB & PostgresSQL)
Advanced use of linux based OS distributions such as CentOS and RHEL for bash scripting and cron configurations
High level troubleshooting of complex payment gateway payment systems for all business partners
Technical lead for communicating complex technical specifications and weekly issue status updates to major clients
